Description.span: Splits the binary structure provided by the "array infos" output of component ROS topic subscriber onto standard types outputs.
Ascii string containing the labels (';' seperated) of the dimensions of the received arrays.
Data sizes (number of elements) for each dimension of the array (output as a vector of integers, one element per dimension).
Data strides for each dimension of the array (output as a vector of integers, 1 element per dimension).
Binary data structure from "ROS topic publisher" component "Array infos" output (when subscribing to sts_msgs numerical array topics).
